org.semanticweb.rulewerk.owlapi

Class OwlToRulesConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.semanticweb.rulewerk.owlapi.OwlToRulesConverter

  • public class OwlToRulesConverter
extends Object
    Class for converting OWL ontologies to rules.
    Author:
    Markus Kroetzsch

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OwlToRulesConverter()
      Constructs an object that fails with a OwlFeatureNotSupportedException when encountering axioms that cannot be converted to rules or facts.
      OwlToRulesConverter(boolean failOnUnsupported)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addOntology(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology owlOntology)
      Converts the given OWL ontology to rules and facts, and adds the result to the internal buffer of rules and facts for later retrieval.
      Set<Fact> getFacts()
      Returns the set of facts generated by transforming the given OWL ontology.
      Set<Rule> getRules()
      Returns the set of rules generated by transforming the given OWL ontology.
      int getUnsupportedAxiomsCount()
      Returns the number of OWL axioms that could not be converted into rules.
      List<org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLAxiom> getUnsupportedAxiomsSample()
      Returns up to 10 unsupported axioms encountered during the conversion.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • OwlToRulesConverter

        public OwlToRulesConverter(boolean failOnUnsupported)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        failOnUnsupported - whether the converter should fail with an OwlFeatureNotSupportedException when encountering axioms that cannot be converted to rules or facts.

      • OwlToRulesConverter

        public OwlToRulesConverter()
        Constructs an object that fails with a OwlFeatureNotSupportedException when encountering axioms that cannot be converted to rules or facts.

    • Method Detail

      • addOntology

        public void addOntology(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology owlOntology)
        Converts the given OWL ontology to rules and facts, and adds the result to the internal buffer of rules and facts for later retrieval.
        Parameters:
        owlOntology - the ontology

      • getFacts

        public Set<Fact> getFacts()
        Returns the set of facts generated by transforming the given OWL ontology. No copy is created, so the set should not be modified if its owner is still to be used.
        Returns:
        set of facts

      • getRules

        public Set<Rule> getRules()
        Returns the set of rules generated by transforming the given OWL ontology. No copy is created, so the set should not be modified if its owner is still to be used.
        Returns:
        set of rules

      • getUnsupportedAxiomsCount

        public int getUnsupportedAxiomsCount()
        Returns the number of OWL axioms that could not be converted into rules. This number is only computed if the object is not configured to fail when encountering the first unsupported axiom.
        Returns:
        total number of unsupported axioms

      • getUnsupportedAxiomsSample

        public List<org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLAxiom> getUnsupportedAxiomsSample()
        Returns up to 10 unsupported axioms encountered during the conversion. The complete number of unsupported axioms can be queried using getUnsupportedAxiomsCount().
        Returns:
        list of first ten unsupported axioms that were encountered
